Posts.EditableText: So, my sister asked me to look up some info on this music thing that's been going on all month near us - local bands playing - and I found this little website. http://www.chavtowns.co.uk Go ahead, see if your town's there.. My town is - twice! Leigh park is mentioned under a Chichester entry and a Havant entry... And I personally class us as part of Havant . It's good that we are a place that is also fighting back against this chav scurge (seeing as how one guy took out 2 of four, and the other two backed away, then hurled abuse from 50 yards). Link: http://www.chavtowns.co.uk/modules.php? ... le&sid=596 ... Now you know why I don't pop down the local pub's. [Edit] http://www.chavscum.co.uk/ seems like a cool place too.
Posts.HTML:
So, my sister asked me to look up some info on this music thing that's been going on all month near us - local bands playing - and I found this little website.
http://www.chavtowns.co.uk

Go ahead, see if your town's there.. My town is - twice!
Leigh park is mentioned under a Chichester entry and a Havant entry... And I personally class us as part of Havant .

It's good that we are a place that is also fighting back against this chav scurge (seeing as how one guy took out 2 of four, and the other two backed away, then hurled abuse from 50 yards).
Link: http://www.chavtowns.co.uk/modules.php? ... le&sid=596

... Now you know why I don't pop down the local pub's.

[Edit]
http://www.chavscum.co.uk/
seems like a cool place too.
